Honda Topknot (Merchant, Men)
kDesc
"Honda-mage" topknot worn by merchants which was folded one-third back and two-thirds forward.\nDefensive Strength:★[#Legal]
Coiffure typique des artisans et commerçants, enroulée un tiers en arrière, deux tiers en avant.\nDéfense:★[#Legal]
Ein "Hondamage"-Haarknoten, getragen von Händlern, der an einer Stelle ein Drittel vom Haaransatz hinten und zwei Drittel vom Haaransatz vorne umgelegt wird.\nVerteidigung:★[#Legal]
Acconciatura tipica dei mercanti. I capelli sono raccolti per un terzo indietro e due terzi in avanti.\nDifesa:★ [#Legal]
El cabello esta enrollado un tercio en la parte de atrás y dos tercios en la parte de adelante. Peluca tradicional japonesa estilo de los habitantes del pueblo.\nDefensa:★ [#Legal]
後方三分、前方七分ほどで折り返した町人スタイルの本多髷。\n防御力 ：★[#Legal]
상투를 정수리 뒤쪽에서 말아올린 서민 스타일의 혼다마게.\n방어력: ★[#Legal]
"Honda-mage" topknot worn by merchants which was folded one-third back and two-thirds forward.\nDefensive Strength:★[#Legal]
市井小民風格的本多髮髻，後方三分，前方七分折回。\n防禦力：★[#Legal]
市井小民風格的本多髮髻，後方三分，前方七分折回。\n防禦力：★[#Legal]
